message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you. This unique offering is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I am excited to extend it to you at a carefully considered price. My proposal is to sell this product to you for $1,250,000. This price reflects a thoughtful balance between the intrinsic value of the product and my objective to ensure a fair transaction. I believe this offer presents an excellent chance for both of us to benefit significantly from this collaboration.
